title: Love Tangle
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.Sometimes you can't run away fast enough or far enough from your past. Just when you thought the naughty adventure between Ciara and Nikolaj can’t get any steamier, Scarlett Avery raises the heat level to unbearable heights. It’s not called Love Tangle for nothing. This alpha billionaire romance with a thrilling story of HOT & OUTRAGEOUSLY raunchy passion is likely to melt your e-reader and keep you on the edge of your seat & begging for more. The Seduction Factor is a series of 6 books. The entire series has a HEA ending.
author: Scarlett Avery
